name: Mario Di Raimondo
content: Mario Di Raimondo – PhD, Assistant Professor Skip to content No results I’m an assistant professor in Computer Science at the University of Catania in Italy. I belong to the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science in Catania. I hold some graduate-level classes for degrees in Computer Science. My research interests are focused on Cryptography: security protocols, cryptographic primitives and network security. I belong to the local Crypto Group.
